# PFTC Course information


## PFTC 7 South Africa

The PFTC7 course will be held in the Drakensberg Mountains in South Africa, between the **1st and 19th of December 2023**.

## Previouse courses

Previously, we have held [courses](https://plantfunctionaltraitscourses.w.uib.no/courses/) in China (PFTC1 and 2), Peru (PFTC3 and 5) as well as on Svalbard (PFTC4) and Norway (PFTC6).
